messages: @John_Bergqvist Amanda Knox was acquitted on appeal! That's the difference! There are eyewitnesses to Lee Rigby's murder. Not the same

@santamariaxx @FredericScholar Shrewd. That's also a baseless accusation. But shrewd on the Knox family. Bear in mind at the time...
